column1: Imagine a world that U never knew

column3: Right above us and it's filled with people just like me and you

column5: We don't need to make a reservation no it's not a ruse

column7: I could take you to the spot but there's one thing you got to do

column9: Tell me how much that it means for you to follow your dreams

column13: And be with who you're meant to be together at last

column31: And it's something so achievable it's all in your mind for you.
